name: Fitting In
description:
A sliding puzzle game that mimics 2048, where you need to combine tiles to transform them into another one.

Use the Arrow Keys to slide ALL tiles in that direction.

For this game, there are 5 tiles that mimic the pathway to generational wealth:

Beginnings

Education (2 Beginning Tiles Combined)

Professional/Career (2 Education Tiles Combined)

Ownership (2 Professional/Career Tiles Combined)

Generational Wealth (2 Ownership Tiles Combined)

How many Black Generational Wealth tiles can you make before the board fills up?

How many Generational Wealth tiles can you make before the board fills up?
